snippet: New York State is investigating whether several banks fraudulently steered homeowners into overpriced policies.
abstract: New York State Department of Finance is investigating several large banks, including JPMorgan Chase, Bank of America, Citigroup and Wells Fargo, to see whether they fraudulently steered homeowners into overpriced insurance policies.
lead_paragraph: New York State is investigating whether several banks fraudulently steered homeowners into overpriced policies.

headline.seo: Big Banks Facing Inquiry Over Possible Insurance Fraud
headline.main: Big Banks Face Inquiry Over Home Insurance
headline.print_headline: Big Banks Face Inquiry Over Home Insurance
